ingredients.item: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

instructions.step: Cut away the thick stalks from the spring greens. Roll up the leaves a few at a time nd shred thinly with a knife.

Melt the butter in a large deep frying pan and fry the shallots and chilli for 3 minutes to soften. Add the greens and cook, stirring, for about 3 minutes, turning the greens in the pan until theyâ€™re softened but not completely wilting.
Drizzle with the honey, stir to mix and transfer to a warmed serving dish.
